txt.en: While following the rumour of a monstrous boar, you are certain to encounter many boars of a usual size. They are no more than a nuisance and should be easily defeated.
The Eastfold is teeming with dangerous boars. By hunting them, you will be providing a service to its inhabitants.
While investigating the rumour of a monstrous boar, you are certain to encounter many boars of a usual size. They are no more than a nuisance and should be easily defeated.
You hunted many boars while following the trail of one monstrous boar, and the Eastfold is better for it.
You hunted many boars while following the trail of one monstrous boar, and the Eastfold is better for it.
The Eastfold is teeming with dangerous boars. By defeating them, you will be providing a service to its inhabitants.
